name: Intro
_source: s;Luther;Indeed. They dwell in caves like beasts.
s;Vincent;Lord Morrissey will probably thank us for rooting them out.
s;Vincent;At this rate, the area will be safe enough that he'll be able to spare the troops.
s;Vincent;He'll help us reclaim House Verstadt yet.
s;Simon;We were too weak to stop those "New Dawn" thugs.
s;Simon;What makes us think we can breach the bandits' lair?
s;Simon;Force seems to be the only thing that matters, and we're at a disadvantage.
s;Luther;Milord, I apologize, but that is talk of a weak man.
s;Luther;We have strategy and wit, which may let us prevail yet.
s;Luther;Notice the weak points in their walls.
s;Luther;Strike here, and we may surprise them in our assault.
s;Simon;You're right. We might find a way out of this if we're lucky.
s;Vincent;But, uh, we can always come back later too.
s;Vincent;Gathering our strength is also a part of good tactics, right?
s;Nika;Someone else is coming after the bandits?
s;Nika;I just hope they've got better luck than me.

speak;Narrator;Some enemies may be too difficult for your current team.{w}{br}If you feel frustrated, try using the Exit option from the preparations screen.{w}{br}You can always return to a map later.;StyleNid=hint
